ShamareKhas:SorceryPoison.NAME: Sorcery Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: When the owner is attacked, if there is X amount of #yUnblockedDamage, deal X times #b%d damage, and reduce X stacks at the end of the attack.

ShamareKhas:SorceryVulnerable.NAME: Sorcery Vulnerable
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage taken from attacks is increased by #y75%. If #yUnblockedDamage is taken during the turn, reduce one stack at the end of the turn.

ShamareKhas:SorceryWeak.NAME: Sorcery Weak
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by attacks is reduced by #y50%. If an attack is made during the turn, reduce one stack at the end of the turn.

ShamareKhas:Namesis.NAME: Namesis
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever the owner takes #yUnblockedDamage, lose #b%d HP, then remove this power.

ShamareKhas:Pardon.NAME: Pardon
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose 1 stack at the end of the turn. While having this power, #yNamesis will not trigger.

ShamareKhas:PeacefulPsyche.NAME: Peaceful Psyche
DESCRIPTIONS: When #yNamesis is triggered, draw #b%d cards, gain %s.

ShamareKhas:CalamityMessenger.NAME: Calamity Messenger
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yDisaster card, draw #b%d cards.

ShamareKhas:HirudoPower.NAME: Hirudo
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted, heal #b%d HP, gain #b%d #yNamesis.

ShamareKhas:Plague.NAME: Plague
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, place #b%d #yVenomousDisaster cards into your discard pile.

ShamareKhas:EdgePower.NAME: Edge Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, place #b%d #yCorruptedBlood cards into your discard pile.

ShamareKhas:PoisonBarrierPower.NAME: Poison Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply #b%d stacks of #yPoison to the attacker.

ShamareKhas:DimBudPower.NAME: Dim Bud
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever the owner takes #yUnblockedDamage, place #b%d #yShadowDisaster cards into your draw pile.

ShamareKhas:DefilePower.NAME: Defile Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, randomly apply #b%d stacks of #ySorceryVulnerable, #b%d stacks of #ySorceryWeak, or #b%d stacks of #ySorceryPoison to a random enemy.

ShamareKhas:AruspicyPower.NAME: Aruspicy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, draw #b%d cards, #yForesee #b%d.

ShamareKhas:TheFoolPower.NAME: The Fool's Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, discard up to #b%d cards. For each #yDisaster card discarded, gain [E], draw 2 cards.
